question: [File: aptos-core/consensus/src/quorum_store/utils.rs] [Function: MempoolProxy::pull_internal()] [Response Type Confusion] At line 141-144, can an attacker send a different QuorumStoreResponse variant than GetBatchResponse, bypassing the type check and causing pattern match failure or incorrect transaction processing?
